name: Sliding Sam HD
description:
Ranked #1 in Belgium!

Press Quotes:

"An original and friendly game which will slide to success" - Funtouch

"This title combines skill and reflection at the junction between Tiny Wings and Cut the Rope and seems destined to a bright future" - jeuxvideo.com

"Sliding Sam is an adorable puzzle-platformer that takes the best aspect of Line Rider and you can have a lot of fun creating complex pathways for Sam" - SlideToPlay

"Fun line drawing physics puzzler. Addictive! Nice graphics!" - One of the many reviewers

Description:

Meet Sam! Sam loves his girlfriend but he is far away from her. Luckily you can help him! Use your finger to draw the lines on which Sam will slide to return to her. Use your skill and imagination to avoid the obstacles, take the boosts and finally get a kiss as your reward :-). Enjoy this fun and original gaming experience with over 100 levels in 5 different universes!

Features:

- HD graphics and new artwork!
- Highly addictive!
- Fun and original gaming experience
- 100 levels in 5 different universes
- Cute graphics and animations
- Realistic physics
- A lot of different solutions to complete each level
- Achievements and leaderboard
